title: Record with Custom Method
description:
Create a record 'Rectangle' with:
- int width
- int height
- A method area() that returns width * height

In main, create a Rectangle(5, 10) and print its area.

Expected output: 50

hints.text: You can add methods inside the record body: record Name(fields) { methods here }
Inside the method, you can access components directly: width * height

commonMistakes.mistake: Declaring width and height as fields inside the record
commonMistakes.correction: Components are already fields - just use them in methods
